ComicInfo.Series: Red Sonja and Vampirella Meet Betty and Veronica
ComicInfo.Summary:
Get ready for Betty and Veronica... in space! The plan to help return Vampirella to her home planet of Drakulon goes seriously awry as the fabulous foursome try and figure out how to navigate between the stars. And how will Red Sonja do in zero gravity? Thereâ€™s only one way to find out!
